verses.verse: And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H2416><s%>: these were the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%>.

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Kiryat-Arba <S%H7153><s%>; the same is Hevron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>: and Avraham <S%H85><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to mourn <S%H5594><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for Sarah <S%H8283><s%>, and to weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for her.

And Avraham <S%H85><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

I am a stranger <S%H1616><s%> and a sojourner <S%H8453><s%> with you: give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> with you, that I may bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> out of my sight <S%H6440><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him,

Hear us <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>: thou art a mighty <S%H430><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> among us <S%H8432><s%>: in the choice <S%H4005><s%> of our sepulchres <S%H6913><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>; none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376><s%> of us shall withhold <S%H3607><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thee his sepulchre <S%H6913><s%>, but that thou mayest bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>.

And Avraham <S%H85><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.

And he communed <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If it be <S%H3426><s%> your mind <S%H5315><s%> that I should bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8800><s%> my dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> out of my sight <S%H6440><s%>; hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, and intreat <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8798><s%> for me to Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zohar <S%H6714><s%>,

That he may give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which he hath, which is in the end <S%H7097><s%> of his field <S%H7704><s%>; for as much <S%H4392><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> as it is worth <S%H4392><s%> he shall give it <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> amongst you <S%H8432><s%>.

And Ephron <S%H6085><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>: and Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, even of all that went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Nay <S%H3808><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, hear me <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: the field <S%H7704><s%> give I <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein, I give it <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee; in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> I it thee: bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>.
And Avraham <S%H85><s%> bowed down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Ephron <S%H6085><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, But if thou wilt give it, I pray thee <S%H3863><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me: I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee money <S%H3701><s%> for the field <S%H7704><s%>; take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it of me, and I will bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> there.
And Ephron <S%H6085><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him,

My lord <S%H113><s%>, hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me: the land <S%H776><s%> is worth four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; what is that betwixt <S%H996><s%> me and thee? bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therefore thy dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>.

And Avraham <S%H85><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ephron <S%H6085><s%>; and Avraham <S%H85><s%> weighed <S%H8254><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%>, which he had named <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, current <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> money with the merchant <S%H5503><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%>, which was in Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which was before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the cave <S%H4631><s%> which was therein, and all the trees <S%H6086><s%> that were in the field <S%H7704><s%>, that were in all the borders <S%H1366><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, were made sure <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>

Unto Avraham <S%H85><s%> for a possession <S%H4736><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, before all that went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> this <S%H3651><s%>, Avraham <S%H85><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>: the same is Hevron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein, were made sure <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> by the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.
